topics.name: Yin Yang Balance
topics.content: Complementary opposites in dynamic balance - light/dark, expansion/contraction
topics.trading_insight: Market cycles between bull/bear, greed/fear. When one extreme is reached, reversal begins.

topics.name: Constant Change (Yi)
topics.content: The only constant is change - yi means change itself
topics.trading_insight: Expect regime changes, nothing lasts forever. The trend will end - prepare for transformation.

topics.name: Wu Wei - Effortless Action
topics.content: Action through non-action - aligning with natural flow rather than forcing
topics.trading_insight: Trade with the trend, don't fight the market. Let the trade come to you.

topics.name: Timing Mastery
topics.content: Right action at right time - understanding cycles and moments
topics.trading_insight: Entry/exit timing is everything. Patience for setup completion.

topics.name: Hexagram 1: The Creative (Qian)
topics.content: Heaven over Heaven - Supreme success, furthering through perseverance
topics.trading_insight: Strong uptrend, maintain long positions. Dragon energy ascending.

topics.name: Hexagram 2: The Receptive (Kun)
topics.content: Earth over Earth - Supreme success through mare's perseverance
topics.trading_insight: Follow the leader, don't initiate. Yield to market direction.

topics.name: Hexagram 11: Peace (Tai)
topics.content: Earth over Heaven - Small departs, great approaches
topics.trading_insight: Harmony in markets, prosperity phase. Good time for accumulation.

topics.name: Five Elements Cycle
topics.content: Wood feeds Fire, Fire creates Earth, Earth bears Metal, Metal carries Water, Water nourishes Wood
topics.trading_insight: Sector rotation follows cycles. What rises must feed the next phase.

yin_yang.description: Complementary opposites in dynamic balance - light/dark, expansion/contraction

constant_change.description: The only constant is change - yi means change
constant_change.trading_application: Expect regime changes, nothing lasts forever

wu_wei.description: Action through non-action - aligning with natural flow rather than forcing
wu_wei.trading_application: Trade with the trend, don't fight the market

timing.description: Right action at right time - understanding cycles and moments
timing.trading_application: Entry/exit timing, patience for setup completion

11_tai.name: Peace
11_tai.judgment: Small goes, great comes - good fortune

tao_principles.tao_te_ching: The Tao that can be spoken is not the eternal Tao
tao_principles.emptiness: Emptiness is the source of all potential
tao_principles.softness: The soft overcomes the hard, water wears away stone
tao_principles.simplicity: Return to uncarved block, embrace simplicity
